sentences.english: This paper company does fictitious transactions exclusively.
sentences.chinese: 這個皮包公司專做買空賣空的生意。

sentences.english: We are having problems with one of the videotape players we purchased from you.
sentences.chinese: 我們向貴公司買空買的錄像機有一臺有問題。

sentences.english: Still, betting against China will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 不過，對中國買空並非易事。
